title: Marketing Career Guide: India Edition (2025)
subtitle: The definitive roadmap to starting and accelerating your marketing career in India
description: A comprehensive, India-specific guide for graduates and young professionals looking to break into marketing. Covers the unique Indian marketing landscape, in-demand skills, educational pathways, entry-level opportunities, and career advancement strategies tailored to the Indian context.

title: 2025 B2B Product Marketing Guide
subtitle: Actionable frameworks for creating differentiated positioning, compelling messaging, and effective go-to-market strategies
description: Master the art and science of B2B product marketing with this comprehensive guide covering strategy development, customer research, messaging frameworks, go-to-market planning, content creation, sales enablement, and performance measurement.

title: Selling B2B SaaS Products in India's Competitive Market
subtitle: A comprehensive framework for successfully positioning, selling, and retaining B2B SaaS customers in India
description: Master the unique challenges of India's B2B SaaS landscape with this actionable playbook covering market entry, positioning, pricing, sales strategies, and customer success practices tailored specifically for the Indian business environment.

title: SaaS B2B Marketing Plan Template to Submit to your CXO
subtitle: A comprehensive, executive-ready framework for building a strategic B2B SaaS marketing plan
description: Create a professional, data-driven marketing plan that secures executive buy-in with this step-by-step template covering market analysis, buyer personas, channel strategy, budget allocation, and performance measurement.

title: Data-Driven Attribution in Marketing
subtitle: A definitive guide to proving marketing's impact on B2B sales and revenue
description: Learn how to implement effective attribution systems that demonstrate marketing's true contribution to the sales pipeline and revenue, create sales-marketing alignment, and optimize marketing investments for maximum ROI.
